name: Griddlys Tale
description:
Griddly the spider has one unique feature: It looks out of even more eyes than normal spiders do. Even better, Griddly has eyes on every side of his hairy, cute cube body. 

Crush your enemies! Move around the board and slay your enemies with the smallest amount of moves.


Use good old WASD to move your little buddy around the board mercilessly crushing your enemies with his body. But there’s a hook. Your little character can only roll as far into one direction as his eyes on that side of his body can see. A three eyes side can only see three tiles far. Try to strategically make your way across the board to both defeat your enemies in as few moves as possible, while making sure not to get caught in the meantime.

We are animators, illustrators, designers and programmers and (for one exception) work at the same company in Munich, Germany.

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK game jam 2022
